name: ProShares S&P Emerging Markets Consumer Staples ETF
description: ProShares S&P Emerging Markets Consumer Staples ETF (CEW) is an exchange-traded fund that aims to provide investors with exposure to companies in emerging markets that are primarily involved in the consumer staples sector. Launched in 2014, this fund tracks the S&P Emerging Markets Consumer Staples Index, which includes companies that produce essential goods such as food, beverages, household products, and personal care items. The ETF offers a diversified portfolio that is designed to mitigate risk while capitalizing on the growing consumer demand in emerging economies. By investing in CEW, investors gain access to a wide range of markets and sectors that are poised for growth due to rising middle-class populations and increasing consumption patterns in these regions. The fund is managed by ProShares, a well-known provider of exchange-traded products, and emphasizes low costs and transparency in its investment strategy. With a focus on consumer staples, CEW is often considered a defensive investment, providing stability during economic downturns while still offering exposure to the upside potential of emerging markets.

products: ProShares S&P Emerging Markets Consumer Staples ETF
